00016 class QString;
00023 template<class function_type>
00024         class CustomFunctionBase {
00025     public:
00026         CustomFunctionBase(): handle (NULL) {}
00028         ~CustomFunctionBase() { if (handle) dlclose (handle); }
00029         QString symbolic ();
00030         bool isValid() const { return valid; }
00031 
00032     protected:
00033         bool loadFunction (const QString &, QString = "f");
00034         void setValid() { valid = true; }
00035         void setInvalid() { valid = false; }
00036 
00037         function_type *func;
00038 
00039     private:
00040         void *handle;
00041         bool valid;
00042 };

00052                         double _umin, double _umax, double _du,
00053                         double _vmin, double _vmax, double _dv,
00054                         bool final = true);
00055         virtual ~CustomFunction() { }
00056 
00057     protected:
00058         virtual RealFunction::function_type f;
00059 };

00110 template<class function_type>
00111         bool CustomFunctionBase<function_type>::loadFunction(const QString &libName, QString funcName) {
00112     const char *error;
00113 
00114     handle = dlopen (libName.toStdString().c_str(), RTLD_LAZY);
00115     if (!handle) {
00116         std::cerr << "Error opening library: " << dlerror() << std::endl;
00117         return false;
00118     }
00119 
00120     func = (function_type *)dlsym(handle, funcName.toStdString().c_str());
00121     if ((error = dlerror()) != NULL)  {
00122         std::cerr << "Error finding function: " << error << std::endl;
00123         return false;
00124     }
00125 
00126     return true;
00127 }
00128 
00131 template<class function_type>
00132         QString CustomFunctionBase<function_type>::symbolic () {
00133     typedef char* STRING;
00134     STRING (*sym)();
00135     sym = (STRING (*)())dlsym(handle, "symbolic");
00136     const char *error;
00137     static char *ret;
00138 
00139     if ((error = dlerror()) != NULL)  {
00140         std::cerr << "Error finding symbolic description in " << error << std::endl;
00141         return QString ("something");
00142     }
00143     ret=(*sym)();
00144     return QString (ret);
00145 }
